description:
The idols the class met in Okinawa, Veil and Nui, have transferred to St. Cherrine Academy. While the whole school greets them with open arms, Veil asks Meguru, with whom she has grown quite close, to show her around the various clubs atthe school. Meanwhile, Sumire overhears Nui having a private conversation with the school nurse, Ms. Oginome...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nengan no Gakuin Seikatsu: Veil no Bukatsu Houmon
The Long-Awaited School Life! Veil`s Club Visit
念願の学院生活☆ヴェイルの部活訪問
